Russo Professor of Computer Science INESC-ID, Rua Alves Redol, nÂ° 9 1000-029 Lisboa, Portugal luis.russo _a_t_ tecnico.ulisboa.pt Phone: (+351) 21 31 00272 Fax: (+351) 21 31 45843 Research I am a computer scientist and researcher that specializes in compressed data structures. I work on developing and analyzing efficient algorithms and data structures for compressing large datasets. In particular I develop applications of compressed data structures to bioinformatics. Software Here are links to some prototypes: Quick Hyper Volume COPS MAX-DAG Teaching I usually teach courses related to algorithms and data structures.
